title: Tech Companies Are Reopening Their Offices, but Tech Work Has Changed Forever - The Wall Street Journal
content: Tech Companies Are Reopening Their Offices, but Tech Work Has Changed Forever  The Wall Street Journal
description: Highly sought-after tech workers don’t want to go back to the way things used to be. Their employers are making their work day more flexible and less distracting, whether they’re (occasionally) in the office or fully remote.
